    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
        connect to Database, always use before you use another method from Database class

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        disconnect from Database, always use when you finished working with the Database class

      • addAccount

        public void addAccount(java.lang.String fn,
                       java.lang.String ln,
                       java.lang.String pw,
                       java.lang.String em,
                       int pc,
                       java.lang.String st,
                       java.lang.String stN,
                       char ge,
                       java.sql.Date bd,
                       java.lang.String stat,
                       int id)
        adds an account to the Database and generates a ledger automatically
        Parameters:
        fn - first name
        ln - last name
        pw - password
        em - email
        pc - postal code
        st - street
        stN - street number
        ge - gender
        bd - birthday
        stat - status
        id - id of the account

      • changePassword

        public void changePassword(java.lang.String email,
                           java.lang.String newPw)
        changes password of this user
        Parameters:
        email - email of the using user
        newPw - new password of the user

      • addHistory

        public void addHistory(int transferNumber,
                       int fromUserID,
                       int toUserID,
                       int amount)
        adds a transfer to the History table in the Database
        Parameters:
        transferNumber - random generated number
        fromUserID - Account id, who transfers his money
        toUserID - Account id, who gets the money
        amount - how much money is transferred

      • addLedger

        public void addLedger(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                      int userID,
                      int pin,
                      int balance)
        adds a Ledger to the Database
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - use method generateAccountNumber() to generate one
        userID - id of the user, who owns the ledger
        pin - use Method generatePIN() to generate one
        balance - the amount of money from the beginning

      • changeBalance

        public void changeBalance(int bl,
                          int accID)
        changes the balance of an ledger
        Parameters:
        bl - use form "old balance - transferred money"
        accID - Account id of the account owning the ledger

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(java.lang.String email)
        deleting user from Database, based on the email
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the account, which you want to delete

      • generateAccountNumber

        public java.lang.String generateAccountNumber()
        automatically generates an account number
        Returns:
        standard account number in germany

      • generatePIN

        public int generatePIN()
        automatically generates pin
        Returns:
        a random pin with 4 digits

      • getUser

        public model.User getUser(java.lang.String email)
        Parameters:
        email - email of the account you want to get from the Database
        Returns:
        User object with every data saved in the Account table of the database, based on the email

      • getUser

        public model.User getUser(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - id of the account you want to get from the database
        Returns:
        User object with every data saved in the Account table of the database, based on the id

      • getUserIDTransfer

        public int getUserIDTransfer(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - account number of the ledger, of which you want to know the owner
        Returns:
        id of the user owning this ledger, based on account number

      • getAccount

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getAccount(java.lang.String whereSearch)
        Just in use to generate the TableView
        Parameters:
        whereSearch - SQL query
        Returns:
        ObservableList with data used to generate columns of the TableView

      • getLedger

        public model.Ledger getLedger(java.lang.String email)
        Parameters:
        email - email of the user owning the ledger
        Returns:
        Ledger object with every data saved in the Ledger table of the database, based on the email
